testsuite.name: com.qa.store.tests.WebstaurantStoreTest

testcase.name: SearchItemAddEmptyCartTest
testcase.system-out: Test case - SearchItemAddEmptyCartTest started 2.Search for 'stainless work table'. wait for the page title:Stainless Work Table - WebstaurantStore wait and assert the search results header shows stainless work table 3.Check the search result ensuring every product has the word 'Table' in its title. 4.Add the last of found items to Cart wait for the last product details page header click on Add To cart button checking the success message after adding the product to the cart click on View Cart button wait for the Cart header in Viewcart page verifying the cart has item 5.Empty Cart. click on empty cart button verify the modal cart dialog title -empty click on Empty Cart Button in modal popup wait and verify the cart empty text Test case - SearchItemAddEmptyCartTest completed

testsuite.system-out: Launching the chromebrowser maximize the window add implicitwait add explicitwait object creating Object for WebDriverUtils class Open the application url-https://www.webstaurantstore.com/ Wait and verify for the webstaurant store title Test case - SearchItemAddEmptyCartTest started 2.Search for 'stainless work table'. wait for the page title:Stainless Work Table - WebstaurantStore wait and assert the search results header shows stainless work table 3.Check the search result ensuring every product has the word 'Table' in its title. 4.Add the last of found items to Cart wait for the last product details page header click on Add To cart button checking the success message after adding the product to the cart click on View Cart button wait for the Cart header in Viewcart page verifying the cart has item 5.Empty Cart. click on empty cart button verify the modal cart dialog title -empty click on Empty Cart Button in modal popup wait and verify the cart empty text Test case - SearchItemAddEmptyCartTest completed started executing the @AfterClass close the browser
